about.aboutText: I have always been fascinated by technology and enjoy to create something of my own. For example, back in school I developed servers for SAMP and programmed in the PAWN language, I was fond of Arduino. I self-taught the Python language, after that I got interested in front-end development and decided to build my career in this direction. Now every day I am developing my own projects and learning new frameworks. Easily adaptable and always result-oriented. My previous job in logistics has taught me how to work quickly and complete large projects on tight deadlines, as well as switch easily between different tasks and work effectively in a team.

project1.name: Trading platform for Binance
project1.about: The trading platform was created to help you trade futures on the largest crypto exchange Binance. The tactic is to grid trade in the long. The trading platform provides statistics on futures, places orders according to specified parameters

project2.name: Share your thoughts
project2.about: This site is an open platform where each user can express their thoughts on any topic by writing a post about it.

project3.name: To-do list
project3.about: To-do list is a platform for creating a to-do list or task list. The user can write down all his important tasks in it, so as not to forget, which allows you to effectively organize your working time
